CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	SCHEDULED PASS, DOMESTIC TRUNK   	A                         
B            	SCHEDULED PASS, LOCAL SERVICE    	B                          
C           	SCHEDULED PASS, ALASKA/HAWAII    	C                          
D            	SCHED PASS, INTERNATIONAL/TERR   	D                         
E            	SCHED PASS, HELICOPTER OPER      	E                         
F            	SCHEDULED AIR CARGO              	F                         
G            	SUPPLEMENTAL AIR CARRIER         	G                         
H            	COMMUTER OPERATOR                	H                          
I            	A/TAXI OPER-CAB EXEMPTION        	I                          
J            	AIR TAXI                         	J                          
K            	AIR TRAVEL CLUB                  	K                          
L            	ALL CARGO                        	L                          
99999        	OPERATORS SFX INVALID            	ERROR MESSAGE
